And here you offered again. I’m assuming he had PMed you a bit but it had trailed off. Here’s how the mechanism works (and it may not be conscious): you get people to think you’re so uneasy doing something, they have to force it on you, in this case, talking. So by coming back and being like this, he got you to eventually practically _beg_ him to talk to you. That way, he didn’t have to ever ask and he could always convince himself you were perfectly fine with anything.
